level1.question: Is the probability of an impossible event 0?
What is the probability of getting a head in a single toss of a fair coin?
Does the probability of a certain event equal 1?
In a deck of 52 cards, what is the probability of drawing an Ace?
What is the probability of rolling a 3 on a fair six-sided die?
If two events A and B are mutually exclusive, what is P(A and B)?
If the probability of an event is 0.7, what is the probability of the event not occurring?
In probability, the sum of the probabilities of all possible outcomes of an experiment is:
If you roll two fair six-sided dice, what is the probability of getting a sum of 7?
Is the probability of an event always between 0 and 1?
If event A has a probability of 0.4 and event B has a probability of 0.5, and A and B are independent, what is P(A and B)?
If the probability of rain on any given day is 0.2, what is the probability that it does not rain?
If two events are independent, the occurrence of one affects the occurrence of the other. True or false?
In a game of rolling a single die, what is the probability of rolling an even number?
In a standard deck of 52 cards, what is the probability of drawing a red card?
If P(A) = 0.4, P(B) = 0.5, and A and B are mutually exclusive, what is P(A or B)?
In a bag with 5 red balls and 3 blue balls, what is the probability of picking a red ball?
What is the probability of drawing a queen from a standard deck of 52 cards?
What is the probability of flipping a coin and getting heads twice in a row?
If an event is certain to happen, its probability is:
What is the probability of drawing an Ace of Spades from a standard deck of 52 cards?
If you draw one card from a standard deck, what is the probability that it is a king or a queen?
If a bag contains 2 red marbles and 3 blue marbles, what is the probability of picking a blue marble?
What is the probability of rolling an odd number on a fair six-sided die?
In a lottery where 10 tickets are sold and there is only one winner, what is the probability of winning if you buy 1 ticket?
